SARS-CoV-2 variants

Open-source tracking for emerging SARS-CoV-2 variants that pose a risk based on COVID-19 vaccine genetics.

Data source

This data has been produced by translation of nucleotide sequences to amino acid. Nucleotide sequence from: Assemblies-of-putative-SARS-CoV2-spike-encoding-mRNA-sequences-for-vaccines-BNT-162b2-and-mRNA-1273. https://github.com/NAalytics/Assemblies-of-putative-SARS-CoV2-spike-encoding-mRNA-sequences-for-vaccines-BNT-162b2-and-mRNA-1273

Translated via https://web.expasy.org/translate/.

Spike-encoding contig assembled from Moderna mRNA-1273 vaccine.

Original data color coding

Green: Start Codon Yellow: Signal Peptide Orange: Spike encoding region Red: Stop codon(s) Purple: 3’ UTR Blue: Start of polyA region (incomplete)

Nucleotide sequence
